title: Spotify Music Controller
body: Web application that allows a user to authenticate with Spotify and create a room where guest can join and control the song by playing/pausing or voting to skip.

title: Capstone Project
body: This project won 1st place in the Systems Analyst 2019 Capstone Project Competition. Web application that allows Sheridan Bike Hub to manage their Bike Rental program by registering customers and keeping track of rentals, as well as managing any late returns.

title: Personal Website
body: Simple website to display my experience, portfolio and contact information.

title: Tech Events Website
body: Website that allows users to login, create Tech Events and search this Events. Each Event has a page that shows related Sessions. Users can add new Sessions and vote in the Sessions they like. Website created as part of the ng-fundamentals course in PluralSight.

title: Checkers
body: Game that allows user to play Checkers against an AI.

title: Asteroids
body: webpage that gets information on NASA's API to show data on near Earth objects

title: NHL Teams App
body: App that gets information from an API to display a list of all the teams in the NHL. The list contains basic information, but when clicking on a team, a new Activity page opens with additional information.

title: Personal Transactions
body: Java application that allows user to record transactions and then search for the transactions saved. Records are saved as text files.

title: Tic Tac Toe
body: Webpage coded with JavaScript that allows the user to play tic-tac-toe

title: Pick-a-Pair

image.alt: Pick a Pair Game Main Page

body: Webpage coded using JavaScript allowing the user to play the game Pick-A-Pair choosing between 3 different board sizes

title: Rock Paper Scissors (JS)
body: Webpage coded with JavaScript that allows the user to play Rock Paper Scissor

title: Rock Paper Scissors (Java)
body: Java application that allows the user to play Rock Paper Scissors against the computer

title: Rock Paper Scissors (PHP)
body: Webpage in PHP that allows the user to play Rock Paper Scissor

title: Forest Game
body: A simple "choose your own adventure" horror game where the user presses specific keys to make decisions.
